name: Staring Back At Me
description:
A pre-transition trans woman finds herself in a dream. As she glances at a mirror, she sees her true self staring back at her. Help her solve the puzzles borne from her mind and unlock the courage she needs to begin her journey.

Game created by Bryony Mair

Character model by Rodolfo Nascimento

Mirror shader by Jeff Johnson

Music by Scott Buckley

Sound effects by Sound Ideas

Mouse & keyboard icons by Andrew Chacon

'Comfortaa' font by Johan Aakerlund and Cyreal

'Fredoka One' font by Milena Brandão


Created in 2 weeks for Rainbow Game Jam 2021
